name: U-Match
brief: Match UMass folks to UMass folks
description:
Platform for matching UMass students with each other based on shared interests.

Being remote hits hard on social life and it's difficult to meet people. U-Match addresses this.

It uses stable-marraige to match users with the similar properties such as year in school, dorms and interests in music. The backend is built with FastAPI, a Python based REST framework and the application is hosted using AWS EC2, RDS and Cognito.
